Player History

Injured on 6/13/2015 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...

Injured on 4/24/2016 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 3 weeks...

Injured on 9/7/2018 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Hit first career homerun on 9/26/2018, off Richard Dagostino (PHI)...
Released by Montreal on 10/23/2019...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 5/6/2020 to a minor league deal...
